definitions.definition: An assignment to someone to undertake a particular task .
An ornamentation or decoration on something that has been constructed .
examples: a dress with elaborate neck detailings

definitions.definition: A careful and thorough cleaning and refurbishing of an automobile , aircraft , boat , etc.
